body: Don’t understand the hate for Fergus on here. Helped Gudao hook up, was basically praising us when he was having sex, and offered to become hole bro’s with us, truly a bro in nature.

ahh, decisions, decisions.
to be kind to Fergus for helping gudao (us) hook up with scheherazade, or to be excessively cruel for effectively netorare'ing us with our own body.

leaning REAL HARD toward punishment here...
CS1: Fergus must insult every woman who would violently take offense to his actions or otherwise antagonize them into action against him.
CS2: Fergus will forever be impotent from this day forth.
CS3: Fergus will run in fear from any woman that wishes to lay with him, and will not persue any who do not.

Command 3: Put your hands in there, and keep going until you bleed out from your crotch.
